cgcloud__Account_Org_Unit__c.name: cgcloud__Account_Org_Unit__c
cgcloud__Account_Org_Unit__c.description: Contains the details of the relationship between customer and the org unit.

cgcloud__Active__c.description: Indicates if the relationship is active (true) or not (false).

cgcloud__Record_Link__c.description: Link to the detail page of the Customer Org Unit record.

cgcloud__Valid_From__c.description: The date from when the entry is valid.

cgcloud__Valid_Thru__c.description: The date until when the entry is valid.
